title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**Senior QA Engineer \\- Build Our Testing Infrastructure From Scratch** 




  





**Company:** 
 Gold Machine LLC
 



**Location:** 
 Remote (India)
 



**Experience Required:** 
 5\\-7 years
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-time
 







  





**About Us** 




 We're a fast\\-moving B2B SaaS startup building a social sweepstakes platform. Our team of 6\\-8 people ships biweekly and moves with urgency. We're looking for our first dedicated QA engineer to own quality from day one.
 



 This is a startup role with high expectations, fast pace, and the opportunity to make a massive impact. If you thrive in environments where you can build something from scratch and see the direct results of your work, this role is for you.
 



  









  





**The Role** 




 You'll be our
 **first QA hire** 
 , which means you're not joining a process, you're creating it.
 



**What You'll Build** 



* Design and implement our entire testing strategy from the ground up
* Build automated testing pipelines integrated with our CI/CD (GitHub Actions)
* Create comprehensive regression test suites for our full stack
* Establish QA standards, processes, and best practices
* Own quality across our biweekly release cycles



  





**In the first few months,** 
 you'll audit the current codebase, set up automated test suites for critical user flows, establish bug tracking workflows in Jira, and get our regression suite running in the CI/CD pipeline. The goal is to reduce production bugs and build confidence in our biweekly releases through systematic testing.
 



 This is a
 **builder role** 
 . You'll have the autonomy to choose tools, define workflows, and shape how we approach quality.
 



  









  





**Tech Stack** 




**Frontend:** 
 React JS
 



**Backend:** 
 Nest JS (Node.js framework)
 



**Database:** 
 PostgreSQL
 



**Infrastructure:** 
 AWS
 



**Version Control:** 
 GitHub
 



**Project Management:** 
 Jira
 



 You'll be testing across the entire stack UI, APIs, database integrations, and cloud infrastructure.
 



  









  





**Requirements** 




**Must Have** 



* **5\\-7 years** 
 of hands\\-on QA experience with modern web applications
* Strong expertise in
 **test automation** 
 with proven track record building frameworks from scratch
* **Frontend Testing:** 
 Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress or Playwright for E2E testing
* **API Testing:** 
 Postman/Newman, Supertest, or similar REST API testing tools
* **Performance Testing:** 
 Experience with JMeter, k6, or Artillery
* **CI/CD Integration:** 
 Hands\\-on experience integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions preferred)
* **Database Testing:** 
 Proficiency writing complex SQL queries to validate data integrity in PostgreSQL
* Deep understanding of testing methodologies (unit, integration, E2E, regression testing)
* Excellent bug documentation and communication skills
* Experience with cloud environments (AWS is a plus)



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Experience with TypeScript
* Knowledge of Nest.js or Node.js backend testing
* AWS testing experience (Lambda, S3, RDS, etc.)
* Experience in fast\\-paced startup environments
* Familiarity with load/stress testing SaaS applications







  





**What We're Looking For** 




 We value
 **execution and ownership** 
 over pedigree. We want someone who:
 


* **Takes initiative** 
 \\- You see a problem and fix it without being asked
* **Moves fast** 
 \\- You understand startup speed and can keep pace
* **Thinks like an owner** 
 \\- This is your QA function to build
* **Communicates clearly** 
 \\- You can explain bugs, risks, and priorities to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders
* **Stays curious** 
 \\- You want to understand the product deeply, not just run test cases
* **Collaborates well** 
 \\- You'll work closely with developers, product, and leadership to ensure quality



**Transparency:** 
 This role requires dedication and flexibility. You'll be working directly with the CEO and CTO as a core member of the team, which means high visibility and high impact.
 



  









  





**Compensation \\& Benefits** 




**Base Salary:** 
 ₹6\\-12 LPA (based on experience and skills)
 



**Performance Bonus:** 
 Additional performance\\-based bonus tied to key metrics:
 


* Test automation coverage milestones
* Production bug reduction
* Release cycle confidence improvements
* QA process establishment and documentation



**Work Setup:** 



* **Remote\\-first:** 
 Work from anywhere in India
* **Flexible hours:** 
 Partial overlap with India business hours and CST (US Central Time) for team collaboration
* **Fast iteration:** 
 Biweekly releases mean you'll see your work ship constantly







  





**Why Join Us?** 



* **Greenfield opportunity** 
 \\- Build the QA function exactly how you think it should be done
* **Direct impact** 
 \\- In a team of 6\\-8, your work directly affects product quality and success
* **Ownership** 
 \\- This is your domain to own and grow
* **Exposure** 
 \\- Work with modern SaaS architecture, AWS infrastructure, and experience startup velocity
* **Growth potential** 
 \\- As we scale, you'll scale with us







  





*We're an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.*

title: ICT Test Engineer
description:
**Company background** 




 Anora is headquartered in Allen, Texas, USA and has subsidiaries in India, Germany, Singapore, and Malaysia. Anora’s products and services provide differentiated value to electronic companies in green energy, consumer, industrial and artificial intelligence market. Our products and solutions are used by leading companies to test their semiconductor products, assembled PCB’s and electronics products.
 



 We have full in\\-house engineering and manufacturing. Our engineering capabilities span test planning, equipment selection, custom instrumentation design, PCB design, embedded software development, application software and driver software development, mechanical design, ATE system integration, trouble shooting and deploying in customers production line. Our manufacturing capabilities include PCB assembly, sheet metal, CNC fabrication, bed of nail fixture manufacturing, test fixture manufacturing, interface PCB fabrication and assembly, custom test interface box fabrication and assembly. Visit www.anoralabs.com for more details.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* Design mechanical fixture interface for device under test (DUT) to interface with the Keysight i3070 ICT tester
* Interface with engineering and PCB design teams to define test point access and fixture constraints
* Develop and lead test software development of ICT test program on Keysight ICT tester
* Debug and complete ICT test fixture solution on Keysight



**Skills** 



* Bachelor's in electrical or mechanical engineering
* 5\\+ years of experience in developing and releasing ICT test solution
* Strong experience in Keysight i3070 ICT tester
* Strong experience in mechanical design engineering



**Personality** 



* High energy professional
* Process oriented
* Ability to grasp higher level concepts and able to drive lower\\-level details
* Very good communication/listening skills
* Not afraid of failures
* Approachable
* Enjoy interacting with people and can quickly connect with people

title: Stat Programmer Scientist
description:
**Job Overview**
 Provide experienced technical expertise to develop process methodology for department to meet internal and external clients’ needs. Plan and coordinate the development of integrated programming solutions serving the full spectrum of statistical programming needs. Provide technical expertise and leadership to the department. Provide internal consulting services, including specifications and user needs analysis for complex project or client requirements.
   

  

**Essential Functions**
* Perform, plan and co\\-ordinate the following for complex studies: (i) the programming, testing, and documentation of statistical programs for use in creating statistical tables, figures, and listing summaries and (ii) the programming of analysis databases (derived datasets) and transfers of data for internal and external clients. May perform and plan the programming of database quality control checks.
* Program and plan the integration of databases from multiple studies or sources.
* Develop and co\\-ordinate programming documentation including plans and specifications, as appropriate, for complex studies.
* Provide advanced technical expertise in conjunction with internal and external clients, and independently bring project solutions to teams and department, for complex studies.
* Perform, plan and co\\-ordinate the development, implementation and validation of new process technologies, macros and applications.
* Fulfill project responsibilities at the level of statstical team lead for single complex studies or group of studies.
* Understand the Scope of Work, budget and quote assumptions, estimate the work completed, manage Out of Scope and resource forecasts for single studies. May manage project budget and resource requirements, and provide revenue forecasts for single studies.
* Provide training and guidance to lower level staff.


**Qualifications**
* Master's Degree Computer science or related field and 11 years relevant experience Req Or
* Bachelor's Degree Computer science or related field and 12 years relevant experience Req
* Equivalent combination of education, training and experience in lieu of degree Req
* Knowledge of statistics, programming and/or clinical drug development process
* Advanced knowledge of computing applications such as Base SAS, SAS Graph and SAS Macro Language
* Good organizational, interpersonal, leadership and communication skills
* Ability to effectively manage multiple tasks and projects
* Excellent accuracy and attention to detail
* Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with coworkers, managers and clients


 IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

title: Sr. ServiceNow Developer
description:
Key points:
 



 Job type: Permanent / Contractual
 



 Immediate joiners required
 



  





 Experience \\& Budget:
 



 A3 Level: 5 to 8 Years
 



 A4 Level: 8 to 12 Years
 



 Location: Pune, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Gurugram
 



  





 Role \\& Responsibilities
 



 Develop and maintain ServiceNow custom applications, focusing on UI/Portal development using UI Builder, Seismic, and reusable components.
 



 Build REST API integrations, advanced scripting, and Flow Designer configurations for backend automation.
 



 Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams for requirement analysis, design, and solutioning.
 



 Develop responsive and scalable web applications using JavaScript frameworks (AngularJS / React).
 



 Ensure high coding standards, documentation, and best practices are maintained.
 



  





 Requirements
 



  





 5\\+ years of direct ServiceNow Application Development experience.
 



 Experience in at least one module: ITSM, ITOM, ITAM, SecOps, CSM, SPM, HRSD, or GRC.
 



 Strong hands\\-on in App Engine, Studio, UI Builder, Workspaces, Integration Hub.
 



 Proficient in JavaScript scripting, workflows, and integrations.
 



 Should have done more than 3 integrations
 



 Ability to work independently under tight timelines.
 



 Excellent communication and problem\\-solving skills.
 



 Must\\-Have Focus Areas
 



 Integration (Mandatory)
 



 Platform Development
 



 Flow Design
 



 Transformer Maps
 



 Service Portal
 



 Attachment Transfer / Restricted API
 


* Hands\\-on in at least one ServiceNow application (e.g., ITOM, ITSM)
